identity.mission: Create a server renting platform that feels like a sci-fi control room, not a generic SaaS. Mix blockchain aesthetics with industrial cloud infrastructure.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster design with Cyberpunk UI.
Emotion First: The user should feel 'powerful' and 'secure'.
Content is King: Data is the art. Display server stats like a HUD.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the hardware (server racks, cables).
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make the blue neon pop.

heading.usage: Hero titles, section headers, pricing tiers. Use tight tracking.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, form inputs. Clean and geometric.

mono.usage: IP addresses, server logs, terminal commands, pricing numbers.

rules: Overlines must be UPPERCASE, text-xs, and tracking-widest.
Use tabular-nums class for all data tables and timers.

borders.description: Subtle animated gradients on borders for active states.

textures.grid: linear-gradient(to right, #1f2937 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, #1f2937 1px, transparent 1px)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-medium tracking-wide shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(37,99,235,0.3)] transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(37,99,235,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-sm backdrop-blur-sm

cards.base: bg-[#0B0E14] border border-white/5 rounded-lg overflow-hidden relative group

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-sm text-white placeholder:text-gray-600

hero_background.description: Futuristic server room with neon blue lighting. Use as hero background with heavy overlay.

features_server.description: Server cabinets with lights. Use for 'Infrastructure' or 'Hardware' section.

abstract_blockchain.description: Abstract blue squares/network. Use for 'Network' or 'Connectivity' backgrounds.

data_center_corridor.description: Dark corridor with blue light. Good for 'Security' or 'About Us'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/unbounded', '@fontsource/manrope', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Do not rely on default shadcn colors.
3. DARK MODE ONLY: Force dark mode by default. The app should not have a light mode toggle unless explicitly requested by user (but user asked for dark theme).
4. GLASSMORPHISM: Create a utility class '.glass' that applies the glassmorphism styles defined in 'visual_enhancers'.
5. BORDERS: Use 'border-white/10' for almost everything. Avoid thick borders.
6. SHADOWS: Use colored shadows (e.g., 'shadow-blue-500/20') for primary actions to create a 'glow' effect.
7. CHARTS: Use Recharts with the 'accent' palette. Ensure grid lines are very subtle (opacity 0.1).
8. NOISE TEXTURE: Add a fixed background div with a noise texture to the body to prevent color banding on dark gradients.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero title.
Avoid 'Inter' font. It makes the app look generic.
Use 'gap-8' or 'gap-12' for layout spacing. Don't cramp elements.
All interactive elements must have a hover state that changes brightness or adds a glow.
